titles.title: CEASE Robocalls Act
To permit the Federal Trade Commission to implement and enforce the Telemarketing and Consumer Fraud and Abuse Prevention Act with respect to certain common carriers, and for other purposes.
CEASE Robocalls Act
Creating Enforcement Authority to Stop Enablers of Robocalls Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Creating Enforcement Authority to Stop Enablers of Robocalls Act or the CEASE Robocalls Act
This bill allows the Federal Trade Commission to implement and enforce the Telemarketing and Consumer Fraud and Abuse Prevention Act with respect to common carriers.
